des:
With Smart Bot skill you can easily control all your Smart Bot devices with your voice, for example you can adjust the brightness of your smart lights or simply turn them on and off, tunable white version enables you to change the ambience from warm white to cool white and with RGB version you can change the color of the light according to your preference. 
Control your electric appliances thanks to the smart plug turning them on and off whenever you want. 

To use Smart Bot devices with Alexa follow these simple steps:
1.Download from Google Play or iOS App Store “Smart Bot” app;
2.Log in or create a new Smart Bot account and connect the smart devices to the app;
3.Search “Smart Bot” skill on Alexa, tap “ENABLE TO USE”;
4.Log in your Smart Bot account on Alexa and wait for Alexa to discover your devices.
5.Try to voice control your smart devices

Here some examples of voice commands:

- Alexa, turn on living room lights
- Alexa, turn off kitchen lights
- Alexa, dim bedroom light
- Alexa, brighten bedroom light
- Alexa, set the kitchen lights to 20 percent
- Alexa, set bedroom light to green.
- Alexa, set living room light to cool white.
- Alexa, turn on coffee maker plug
- Alexa, turn off fan plug

*To add a new device, rename it and to group some devices into a scene or a room please use Smart Bot app
**Zigbee devices requires Smart Bot Zigbee Gateway



For any problems,please contact us at helpsmartbot@botlighting.it
